mapper.update: update data_favorite set title=#{title},publish_time=#{publish_time}, favoritetime=Now(),status=1, emotionalIndex=#{emotionalIndex}, projectid=#{projectid},groupid=#{groupid}, source_name=#{source_name} where article_public_id=#{article_public_id} and user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.select: select * from data_favorite where user_id = #{user_id} order by favoritetime desc limit 5
select * from data_favorite where user_id = #{user_id} and article_public_id = #{public_id}
select af.* from data_favorite af left join project p on af.projectid=p.project_id where af.user_id = #{user_id} and p.is_selected=1 order by af.favoritetime desc limit 5
